(Just to let you know, Code, the Predacon's base's shields ARE up, so not all 
of the autoguns will be able to be shot)

Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Double Punch/Hiss/Breakdown:

Injector, Manterror, and Bumblebee each reached a seperate hatch.  Strangely, 
each called to Double Punch via comlink asking where the attackers were.

---

Double Punch yelled, kicing at the ground.  Looking wildly through the 
scanners, he found the People's Group all around.  Bringing more autoguns 
online to open fire on them, the shields starting to weaken and a few 
autoguns not in the protection of the shield being destroyed, he replied to 
the three Predacons who had contacted him, telling them the coordinates.

---

Injector opened his hatch, seeing some of the People's group.  Firing a 
double blast of optic lasers randomly at the People's group, he fired off 
three stinger missiles off at more random targets. 

---

Manterror opened his hatch slightly, firing off two ion disks at the People's 
group randomly.

---

Bumblebee opened a hatch, firing three stinger missiles from both of his 
stinger missile launchers at Scamrock, two optic blasts firing randomly.

---

"Idiots!" Double Punch yelled, activating internal defenses, not aware that 
the counter assaulting Predacons would be protected by shields.

============

Breakdown awoke slowly, cursing.  Kicking Hiss, who began to wake up.

---

"What?!" Hiss yelled, standing slowly.

---

"Let's get to the Predacon base.  The Maxis betrayed us!"  Activating his com 
as they both ran, Breakdown spoke with Zardus.  <Zardus, this is Breakdown, 
we were jumped by the Maximals!  They must've took us for dead.  We've been 
double crossed, and those stinking Maximals are doing the crossing!  We're 
heading to the Pred base!>
